text: Aur woh kehtay hain kay jo cheez inn mawashi kay pet mein hai woh khalis humaray mardon kay liye hai aur humari aurton per haram hai. Aur agar woh murda hai to iss mein sab barabar hain abhi Allah inn ko inn ki ghalat biyani ki saza diye deta hai bila shuba woh hikmat wala hai aur woh bara ilm wala hai
